summary: A nonprofit hospital petitions for reconsideration of Determination No. 13-0198 (Determination), which affirmed the Department of Revenue’s denial of a refund of business and occupation (B&O) taxes it paid on revenues it received for providing medical services to employees under its employee medical benefit plan, and which sustained the B&O tax assessed on amounts the hospital excluded from its gross income as alleged discounts to its employees. We deny the hospital’s petition for reconsideration.
